titlestmt.titleproper: Central and Hutchinson-Central Alumni Association Records
titlestmt.author: Patricia M. Virgil

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created with EADitor by Amy Miller.

did.unittitle: Central and Hutchinson-Central Alumni Association Records

physdesc.extent: 2 boxes + 1 card file box (1.5 linear ft.)

origination.corpname: Central and Hutchinson-Central Alumni Association (Buffalo, N.Y.)

controlaccess.subject: Frederick A. Vogt Memorial Scholarship
High Schools New York (State) Buffalo Alumni

accessrestrict.p: Researchers wishing to access this collection must apply for a Scholar Pass and present valid photo ID upon arrival to the library.

scopecontent.p: Lists of members of graduating classes of Central High School, 1861-1914, and of Hutchinson-Central High School, 1914-1954; lists of life members of the Central and Hutchinson-Central Alumni Association; a list of faculty members of Hutchinson-Central, 1914-1953, and of Frederick A. Vogt Memorial Scholarship recipients, 1925-1961. Includes some issues of the "Alumni News," 1933, 1939-1954, and a photograph, programs and clippings.

arrangement.p: Collection is arranged into three series: I. Class lists, 1861-1953. II. Lists of graduates, life members, teachers and scholarship winners, ca. 1940-1961. III. Alumni News, 1939-1954. Chronological arrangement within series.

userestrict.p: Written permission required to reproduce and/or publish. Information on use and fees may be obtained from the Director of Library and Archives.

did.unittitle: Series II: Lists of graduates, life members, teachers and scholarship winners
